text: The Right Honourable Herbert Eser "Herb" Gray (May 25, 1931 - April 21, 2014) was a Canadian politician and lawyer. He was a cabinet minister and served under three prime ministers. He was the Deputy Prime Minister of Canada from 1997 until 2002, when Jean Chr√©tien was Prime Minister. He was also Canada's first Jewish federal cabinet minister. Gray was born in Windsor, Ontario. He was married to Sharon Sholzberg and had two children.
